items.content_html: Imagist is a lightweight, client-side image editing tool built with HTML, CSS (Tailwind CSS and custom styles), and vanilla JavaScript. It offers a clean, modern, and intuitive interface, inspired by Apple's design aesthetic, allowing users to perform common image manipulation tasks directly in their browser.
items.title: vladanila/imagist: Imagist is a lightweight, client-side image editing tool built with HTML, CSS (Tailwind CSS and custom styles), and vanilla JavaScript. It offers a clean, modern, and intuitive interface, inspired by Apple's design aesthetic, allowing users to perform common image manipulation tasks directly in their browser.

items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for a CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware...

items.content_html: Spring Commerce is a lightweight and flexible e-commerce web application built with Spring Boot. It features user authentication, product management, shopping cart, order processing, and admin dashboard. Designed for learning, practicing, or extending into a full-featured commercial solution.
items.title: DinhPhatPhat/Spring-Commerce: Spring Commerce is a lightweight and flexible e-commerce web application built with Spring Boot. It features user authentication, product management, shopping cart, order processing, and admin dashboard. Designed for learning, practicing, or extending into a full-featured commercial solution.

items.title: Vlad345345/bs-progressbar: Lightweight JavaScript overlay progress bar as a singleton utility

items.content_html: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
items.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

items.content_html: üßà ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. Create smooth, customizable notifications with flexible positioning, progress indicators, and interactive elements. Modern, accessible, and easy to integrate into any project.
items.title: BAHEKARPRANAV/ButterPop.js: üßà ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
